description:
Oh Canada, home to -40°C wind chills and 8m+ average snowfalls. Sport the Canadian flag and some of the animals we're best known for while you shred the best mountains in Canada. These lightweight ski socks have strategic cushioned zones for comfort, but the rest of the sock is kept light, so they slide inside performance-fit boots.

  • 4 Degree Elite Fit System combines two elastics for stretch and recovery to keep the socks in place
  • Indestructawool™ blend improves durability in high-wear areas
  • Shred Shield™ reinforced toe cap adds durability
  • Mesh vent zones provide temperature and moisture management
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear
name: Smartwool Ski Targeted Cushion Canada OTC Socks - Unisex
